title: Official Statistics and Big Data Processing with Artificial Intelligence: Capacity Indicators for Public Sector Organizations
analysis_techniques: Convex logistic principal component analysis; Descriptive analysis
research_description: The article discusses capacity indicators for processing official statistics and big data using artificial intelligence in public sector organizations. It evaluates the strengths and weaknesses of Pakistan's national statistical systems and public sector institutions through a survey, and introduces capacity scores using convex logistic principal component analysis.
research_results: The findings reveal that while the public sector recognizes the importance of big data, they lack the necessary IT skills and infrastructure to process it effectively. Most organizations hesitate to share data due to privacy concerns, and training in big data and statistical skills is urgently needed.
future_research: Further studies could explore the role of public-private partnerships in strengthening IT infrastructure and data processing capabilities in public sector organizations.
